oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jamestown Cemetery: grave markers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color photograph of cemetery grounds, showing a mix of headstone styles. In the foreground a small obelisk stands near a rectangular block that appears to have a sign mounted on it. The cemetery is partially wooded.

Jamestown Cemetery is located in Tipton County, TN. Jamestown is an unincorporated area near the towns of Burlison and Gilt Edge that is home to at least two notable African American churches, Bright Hill Missionary Baptist and Carey Chapel AME churches.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cemeteries;
